casebody.data:
IN RE: E.D. 125PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 26, 2018 Wyatt B. Orsbon, Assistant Appellant Defender, Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, for E.D. Robert T. Broughton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 24th of September 2018 by Respondent:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of September 2018."

Respondent shall have up to and including the 9th day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
